title: The very best Victoria sandwich
ingredients: ['For the cake', '225 g (8 oz) softened butter', '225 g (8 oz) caster sugar', '4 large eggs', '225 g (8 oz) self-raising flour', '2 level teaspoons baking powder', 'For the filling', 'strawberry or raspberry jam', '1 (300ml) tub double cream', 'icing sugar']
